title: The Patriot Bride
description: When Hannah Cooper flees England to escape an arranged marriage, her new existence as al "widow" leaves her content. But when war hits the colonies her home is among those forced to house British troops. When she and new guest Wolfgang Preston realize his is the man she is to marry, she resists him. Can he tame this Colonial spitfire enough to make her a good wife?
author: Carolyn Faulkner
